doc.field: New York University Collection of Contemporary Composers' Websites
New York University Collection of Contemporary Composers' Websites

Paul Dooley is an orchestral composer focusing on a "cross-cultural range of contemporary music, dance, art, technology and the interactions between the human and natural worlds." The website contains his music, photos, and concert listings. Dooley wrote the Conductor's Spellbook, an orchestral work designed for young audiences with illustrations by Tanner Porter. The website includes curriculum information, reviews, and a performance schedule.
Crawl was limited to domains and subdomains of https://www.conductorsspellbook.com/ and https://www.pauldooley.net/ in order to remain within the collection scope and data constraints.
The Conductor's Spellbook Archived Website: April 2022-ongoing
